DOC.brief_summary: Purpose: To develop a real time national clinical database to support and share best practices, 1. To generate hypotheses for future clinical research 2. To understand how AMEVIVE is used in routine clinical practice/real world setting. Each patient visit will include the following observational endpoints: 1. AMEVIVE dosing 2. Number of courses 3. Concomitant treatment 4. Response to treatment (patient and physician global assessments) 5. Status of other psoriasis-related medical conditions 6. Time to re-treatment.
DOC.brief_title: Amevive Wisdom Acquired From Real-Time Evidence (A.W.A.R.E™) Program
DOC.criteria: Amevive is clinically indicated for the patient Amevive is contraindicated for the patient
